feed.title: Salil Chandra Atom Feed
feed.subtitle: This is my Atom feed composed of news articles I find interesting.

entry.title: Google is permanently nerfing all Home Minis because mine spied on everything I said 24/7 [Update x2]
entry.summary: Recently, privacy concerns have been expressed over Google Home products.

entry.title: Roger Federer beats Rafael Nadal for fifth straight time, wins Shanghai Masters title
entry.summary: Meeting for the fourth time this year, Federer once again defeats Nadal to win the Masters 1000 title in Shanghai.

entry.title: Hurricane Ophelia heading to Ireland, then Scotland
entry.summary: Hurricane Ophelia is a Category 2 storm that is heading east towards Ireland. It is travelling farther east than any other major hurricane.

entry.title: Hogwarts Express rescues stranded family in Scotland
entry.summary: The Jacobite steam train, the one featured in the Harry Potter movies, rescued a family of six this past Friday in Scotland.
